channel.title: Add Pk Zones?
channel.description:
Hi, i've used the search on tutorials and found no tutorials on how to add in a Pk Zone, only a safe zone. Can someone help me with this?
Also, if you can give me an easier to understand 1v1 only pking spot tutorial, the one i found is way too hard to understand.
Thnx in advanced, please don't flame T_T

item.title: Add Pk Zones?
item.dc:creator: @o_b_b_y_k_o o b b y k o
item.description:
@o_b_b_y_k_o wrote:

okay, search “nonWild” in ur client.java. it should come with public boolean nonWild() (if not, something similar.) then search for the coords around edge and varrock. if u find a match to the server, delete them, this should make it wild.

i have never use IsInWilderness, but my guess is that is the oposite of nonwild, so show me wat is under IsInWild

Read full topic

item.title: Add Pk Zones?
item.dc:creator: @Mufalmar Mufalmar
item.description:
@Mufalmar wrote:

well… my varrok and edgeville are safe zones for some reason. how do i figure out which of the safezones is edge or varrok? By default both of these spots are nonwild =S

I have IsInWilderness in my client.java btw if that helps.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 22, 2008, 09:27:11 PM[/size][hr]Bumpppp

Read full topic

item.title: Add Pk Zones?
item.dc:creator: @stormcutter stormcutter
item.description:
@stormcutter wrote:

just remove the safezone
